text: Ðis synd þa landgemæro þæs landes þe eadwig cyning ageaf þam halgan were æt bemtune, & þam hyrede, & siððan leofric biscop be willhelmes cynges unnan, let gebocyan into sancte þetres mynstre on exancestre.
Ærest þær ceoman lace ut scyt, andlang ceoman lace þæt hit cymeð on temese, anlang temese westward swa westsexena gemære is & myrcena þæt hit cymeð up to ðam gemyðan.
Þonne went hit on ða norðeran ea, þæt hit cymeð to anre lace betwix berhtulfing yge & hrisyge, þæt on ða norð ea, þæt anlang þære ea.
Þæt hit cymeð eft to ceoman lace, & þæt land æt cyngbrycge norð andlang broces þæt hit cymð þær holanbroc ut scytt, andlang broces up to þam wege be norðan cynstanes treowe.
Andlang weges to fulan broces heafdon, andlang broces on þa stanbricge, of þære stanbricge andlang weges on burgdyc.
Andlang dyc on þone broc, andlang broces eft on cyngbricge, a on ecnisse into sancte Petres mynstre on Exancestre, & ealle þa teoðunga þæs cyninges.
Þis synd þa langemæro þære anre hyde & þære oðerhealfan gyrde æt holacumbe þe læg into doflisc þe leofric biscop let gebocyan for his sawle into sancte petres mynstre on exancestre.
Ærest on crampansteort, of crampansteorte on flora heafdo & of flora heafdo up on þone weg be westa ðære cyrcan up to þa ferngara.

Of þam ferngara to þam dunnastane, of ðam dunnastane up to þære dyc, & swa east andlang þære dyc to þan wætere of þam wætere norð on þæs crohtes heafod & swa norð on þa smala paðe swa on dun to þære þwirs dic & swa to dofolisces landscore adun to arietes stane & swa andlang strandes to crampansteorte.
